member.name: T:Library.Facade.Battle
member.summary:
Static class responsible for managing the battle between two players. It includes turn selection, displaying the current player's options, and delegating actions to the appropriate methods.
You’re not re-creating the values; you’re simply accessing them as part of Battle.StartBattle. When you pass player1 and player2 to Battle, you’re passing the references to these Player objects. This means that Battle is using the same player instances created in Facade—it’s not making new copies of them.
